00030 #include "iconsettings.h"
00031 
00032 IconSettings::IconSettings(QString prefix_name, QString dir_name, QString icon_name, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00033 {
00034     /*
00035      ** This functions is constructor for IconSettings dialog
00036      *
00037      * Args:
00038      * @newIcon -- This define which type of dialog we'l use "New Icon" or "Edit Icon"
00039      * @p_id    -- PrefixId
00040      * @p_id    -- PrefixId
00041      */
00042     setupUi(this);
00043 
00044     // Loading libq4wine-core.so
00045     libq4wine.setFileName("libq4wine-core");
00046 
00047     if (!libq4wine.load()){
00048         libq4wine.load();
00049     }
00050 
00051     // Getting corelib calss pointer
00052     CoreLibClassPointer = (CoreLibPrototype *) libq4wine.resolve("createCoreLib");
00053     CoreLib = (corelib *)CoreLibClassPointer(true);
00054 
00055     // Creating database classes
00056     db_prefix = new Prefix();
00057     db_icon = new Icon();
00058 
00059     this->prefix_name = prefix_name;
00060     this->dir_name = dir_name;
00061     this->icon_name = icon_name;
00062     this->prefix_path = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(this->prefix_name).at(1);
00063     if (this->prefix_path.isEmpty()){
00064           this->prefix_path = QDir::homePath();
00065           this->prefix_path.append("/.wine/drive_c/");
00066     } else {
00067           this->prefix_path.append("/drive_c/");
00068     }
00069 
00070 
00071     // Creating side bar urls
00072     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::rootPath());
00073     prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(QDir::homePath());
00074 
00075     if (QDir(this->prefix_path).exists())
00076        prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(this->prefix_path);
00077 
00078     QString cd_mount = db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(this->prefix_name).at(6);
00079 
00080     if (!cd_mount.isEmpty())
00081       if (QDir().exists(cd_mount))
00082           prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(cd_mount);
00083 
00084     this->loadThemeIcons(this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString());
00085 
00086     switch (icon_name.isEmpty()){
00087         case TRUE:
00088             lblCaption->setText(tr("Adding new icon"));
00089             setWindowTitle(tr("Adding new icon"));
00090         break;
00091         case FALSE:
00092             lblCaption->setText(tr("Icon settings"));
00093             setWindowTitle(tr("Icon settings"));
00094             getIconReccord();
00095         break;
00096     }
00097 
00098     connect(twbGeneral, SIGNAL(currentChanged(int)), this, SLOT(ResizeContent(int)));
00099     connect(cmdAdd, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdAdd_Click()));
00100     connect(cmdGetProgram, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetProgram_Click()));
00101     connect(cmdGetWorkDir, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetWorkDir_Click()));
00102     connect(cmdGetIcon, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdGetIcon_Click()));
00103     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdCancel_Click()));
00104     connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00105 
00106     connect(cbUseConsole, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(cbUseConsole_stateChanged(int)));
00107 
00108     twDlls->installEventFilter(this);
00109 
00110     cboxDlls->addItems(CoreLib->getWineDlls(db_prefix->getFieldsByPrefixName(prefix_name).at(2)));
00111     cboxDlls->setMaxVisibleItems (10);
00112 
00113     return;
00114 }
00115 
00116 void IconSettings::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath){
00117     QPixmap pixmap;
00118 
00119     if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/exec.png").arg(themePath))){
00120         pixmap.load(":data/exec.png");
00121     }
00122 
00123     lblLogo->setPixmap(pixmap);
00124 
00125     cmdGetProgram->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00126     cmdGetWorkDir->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00127 
00128     cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/exec_wine.png", themePath));
00129 
00130     return;
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 QIcon IconSettings::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00135     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00136     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00137 
00138     QIcon icon;
00139 
00140     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00141         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00142         if (icon.isNull()){
00143             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00144         }
00145     } else {
00146         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00147     }
00148 
00149     return icon;
00150 }
00151 
00152 void IconSettings::getIconReccord(){
00153     QList<QStringList> iconRec;
00154 
00155     if (this->dir_name.isEmpty()){
00156         iconRec = db_icon->getIconsInfoByPrefixName(this->prefix_name, this->icon_name);
00157     } else {
00158         iconRec = db_icon->getIconsInfoByNames(this->prefix_name, this->dir_name, this->icon_name);
00159     }
00160 
00161     txtName->setText(iconRec.at(0).at(1));
00162     txtCmdArgs->setText(iconRec.at(0).at(9));
00163     txtProgramPath->setText(iconRec.at(0).at(10));
00164 
00165     iconPath.clear();
00166 
00167     if (!iconRec.at(0).at(3).isEmpty()){
00168         if (QFile(iconRec.at(0).at(3)).exists()){
00169             cmdGetIcon->setIcon (QIcon(iconRec.at(0).at(3)));
00170             iconPath=iconRec.at(0).at(3);
00171         } else {
00172             iconPath=iconRec.at(0).at(3);
00173             if (iconPath=="wineconsole"){
00174                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/wineconsole.png", this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString()));
00175             } else if (iconPath=="regedit"){
00176                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/regedit.png", this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString()));
00177             } else if (iconPath=="wordpad"){
00178                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/notepad.png", this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString()));
00179             } else if (iconPath=="winecfg"){
00180                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/winecfg.png", this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString()));
00181             } else if (iconPath=="uninstaller"){
00182                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/uninstaller.png", this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString()));
00183             } else if (iconPath=="eject"){
00184                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/eject.png", this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString()));
00185             } else if (iconPath=="explorer"){
00186                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/explorer.png", this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString()));
00187             } else {
00188                 cmdGetIcon->setIcon(loadIcon("data/exec_wine.png", this->CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString()));
00189                 iconPath="";
00190             }
00191         }
00192     }
00193 
00194     txtDesc->setText(iconRec.at(0).at(2));
00195     txtDisplay->setText(iconRec.at(0).at(8));
00196     txtWinedebug->setText(iconRec.at(0).at(6));
00197     txtWorkDir->setText(iconRec.at(0).at(4));
00198     txtDesktopSize->setText(iconRec.at(0).at(11));
00199     spinNice->setValue(iconRec.at(0).at(12).toInt());
00200 
00201     if (iconRec.at(0).at(7)=="1"){
00202         cbUseConsole->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
00203         txtWinedebug->setEnabled(TRUE);
00204     } else {
00205         cbUseConsole->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00206         txtWinedebug->setEnabled(FALSE);
00207     }
00208 
00209     QStringList override = iconRec.at(0).at(5).split(";");
00210 
00211     QString overrideorder;
00212 
00213     for (int i=0; i<override.count()-1; i++){
00214 
00215         QStringList list2 = override.at(i).split("=");
00216             twDlls->insertRow (0);
00217             QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(list2.at(0));
00218             twDlls->setItem(0, 0, newItem);
00219             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00220 
00221             if (list2.at(1)=="n")
00222                 overrideorder = tr("Native");
00223             if (list2.at(1)=="b")
00224                 overrideorder = tr("Buildin");
00225             if (list2.at(1)=="n,b")
00226                 overrideorder = tr("Native, Buildin");
00227             if (list2.at(1)=="b,n")
00228                 overrideorder = tr("Buildin, Native");
00229 
00230 
00231             newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(overrideorder);
00232             twDlls->setItem(0, 1, newItem);
00233             newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00234     }
00235 
00236     return;
00237 }
00238 
00239 bool IconSettings::eventFilter( QObject *object, QEvent *event )
00240 {
00241    //  firstly, check whether the object is the QTableWidget and if it's a mouse press event
00242     if (object == twDlls)
00243         if (event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00244         {   // if yes, we need to cast the event
00245         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = static_cast<QKeyEvent*>(event);
00246         if (keyEvent->key()==Qt::Key_Delete)
00247             twDlls->removeRow(twDlls->currentRow());
00248 
00249         return true;
00250         }
00251 
00252     return QWidget::eventFilter(object, event);
00253 }

00256 void IconSettings::ResizeContent(int TabIndex){
00257 
00258     switch (TabIndex){
00259         case 1:
00260             twDlls->resizeRowsToContents();
00261             twDlls->resizeColumnsToContents();
00262             twDlls->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00263         break;
00264     }
00265 
00266     return;
00267 }
00268 
00269 void IconSettings::resizeEvent (QResizeEvent){
00270     ResizeContent(2);
00271     return;
00272 }

00278 void IconSettings::cbUseConsole_stateChanged(int){
00279     switch(cbUseConsole->checkState()){
00280         case Qt::PartiallyChecked:
00281             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(TRUE);
00282         break;
00283         case Qt::Checked:
00284             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(TRUE);
00285         break;
00286         case Qt::Unchecked:
00287             txtWinedebug->setEnabled(FALSE);
00288         break;
00289     }
00290 
00291     return;
00292 }

00298 void IconSettings::cmdGetWorkDir_Click(){
00299 
00300     QString fileName, searchPath=this->prefix_path;
00301 
00302     if ((!txtProgramPath->text().isEmpty()) and (QDir().exists(txtProgramPath->text()))){
00303         searchPath=txtProgramPath->text().left(txtProgramPath->text().length() - txtProgramPath->text().split("/").last().length());;
00304     }
00305 
00306     if (!QDir(searchPath).exists()){
00307         if (QDir(this->prefix_path).exists()){
00308            searchPath=this->prefix_path;
00309         } else {
00310            searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00311         }
00312      }
00313 
00314     QList<QUrl> add_prefix_urls = this->prefix_urls;
00315     if ((searchPath != this->prefix_path) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00316         add_prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00317 
00318     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00319       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden);
00320 
00321       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::Directory);
00322       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open Directory"));
00323       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00324       // This option works only it qt 4.5. In fact this not works correctly with QDir::Hidden,  so I comment it out for a some  time
00325       // dialog.setOption(QFileDialog::ShowDirsOnly, true);
00326       dialog.setSidebarUrls(add_prefix_urls);
00327 
00328     if (dialog.exec())
00329         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00330 
00331     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00332         txtWorkDir->setText(fileName);
00333     }
00334     return;
00335 }
00336 
00337 void IconSettings::cmdAdd_Click(){
00338     if (!cboxDlls->currentText().isEmpty()){
00339         twDlls->insertRow (0);
00340         QTableWidgetItem *newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(cboxDlls->currentText());
00341         twDlls->setItem(0, 0, newItem);
00342         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00343         newItem = new QTableWidgetItem(cboxOveride->currentText());
00344         twDlls->setItem(0, 1, newItem);
00345         newItem->setFlags( Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable );
00346     }
00347 
00348     twDlls->resizeRowsToContents();
00349     twDlls->resizeColumnsToContents();
00350     twDlls->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(TRUE);
00351     return;
00352 }
00353 
00354 void IconSettings::cmdGetProgram_Click(){
00355 
00356     QString fileName, searchPath = this->prefix_path;
00357 
00358     if (!txtProgramPath->text().isEmpty()){
00359         if (!txtWorkDir->text().isEmpty()){
00360         searchPath=txtWorkDir->text();
00361         } else {
00362         searchPath=txtProgramPath->text().left(txtProgramPath->text().length() - txtProgramPath->text().split("/").last().length());;
00363         }
00364     }
00365 
00366     if ((!QDir(searchPath).exists()) or (searchPath.isEmpty())){
00367         if (QDir(dir_name).exists()){
00368            searchPath=this->prefix_path;
00369         } else {
00370            searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00371         }
00372      }
00373 
00374     QList<QUrl> add_prefix_urls = this->prefix_urls;
00375     if ((searchPath != this->prefix_path) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00376         add_prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00377 
00378     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00379       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden | QDir::Files );
00380       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open Exe file"));
00381       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00382       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
00383       dialog.setNameFilter(tr("Exe files (*.exe)"));
00384       dialog.setSidebarUrls(add_prefix_urls);
00385 
00386      if (dialog.exec())
00387         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00388 
00389     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00390             QStringList list1 = fileName.split("/");
00391             txtName->setText(list1.last().left(list1.last().length() - list1.last().split(".").last().length() - 1));
00392             txtProgramPath->setText(fileName);
00393 
00394             QString wrkDir;
00395             wrkDir = fileName.left(fileName.length() - list1.last().length());
00396             txtWorkDir->setText(wrkDir);
00397     }
00398 
00399     return;
00400 }
00401 
00402 void IconSettings::cmdGetIcon_Click(){
00403 
00404     QString fileName, searchPath=this->prefix_path;
00405 
00406 
00407     if ((!txtWorkDir->text().isEmpty()) and (QDir(txtWorkDir->text()).exists())){
00408         searchPath = txtWorkDir->text();
00409     } else {
00410         if (QDir(this->prefix_path).exists()){
00411            searchPath=this->prefix_path;
00412         } else {
00413            searchPath=QDir::homePath();
00414         }
00415     }
00416 
00417 
00418     qDebug()<<searchPath;
00419 
00420     QList<QUrl> add_prefix_urls = this->prefix_urls;
00421     if ((searchPath != this->prefix_path) && (QDir(searchPath).exists()))
00422         add_prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(searchPath);
00423 
00424     QString addPath;
00425     addPath=QDir::homePath();
00426     addPath.append("/.config/");
00427     addPath.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00428     addPath.append("/icons");
00429 
00430     if ((QDir(addPath).exists()))
00431         add_prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(addPath);
00432 
00433     addPath=QDir::homePath();
00434     addPath.append("/.local/share/icons/");
00435 
00436     if ((QDir(addPath).exists()))
00437         add_prefix_urls << QUrl::fromLocalFile(addPath);
00438 
00439     QFileDialog dialog(this);
00440       dialog.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Hidden | QDir::Files );
00441       dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
00442       dialog.setWindowTitle(tr("Open image file"));
00443       if ((!iconPath.isEmpty()) and (QFile(iconPath).exists())){
00444           QStringList list = iconPath.split("/");
00445           searchPath = iconPath.left(iconPath.length() - list.last().length());
00446       }
00447       dialog.setDirectory(searchPath);
00448 
00449         #ifndef WITH_ICOTOOLS
00450         dialog.setNameFilter(tr("Image files (*.png *.jpg *.gif *.bmp *.xpm)"));
00451         #else
00452         dialog.setNameFilter(tr("Image and Win32 binary files (*.png *.jpg *.gif *.bmp *.xpm *.exe *.dll);;Image files (*.png *.jpg *.gif *.bmp *.xpm);;Win32 Executable (*.exe);;Win32 Shared libraies (*.dll);;Win32 Executable and Shared libraies (*.exe *.dll)"));
00453         #endif
00454       dialog.setSidebarUrls(add_prefix_urls);
00455 
00456      if (dialog.exec())
00457         fileName = dialog.selectedFiles().first();
00458 
00459     if(!fileName.isEmpty()){
00460         if ((fileName.toLower().right(3)!="exe") && (fileName.toLower().right(3)!="dll")){
00461             cmdGetIcon->setIcon (QIcon(fileName));
00462         } else {
00463 
00464             QStringList args;
00465             args << "-x";
00466             args << "-t" << "14";
00467 
00468             QString tmpDir;
00469             QStringList list1 = fileName.split("/");
00470 
00471             tmpDir.append(QDir::homePath());
00472             tmpDir.append("/.config/");
00473             tmpDir.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00474             tmpDir.append("/tmp/");
00475             tmpDir.append(list1.last());
00476 
00477             QDir tmp(tmpDir);
00478             tmp.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::NoSymLinks);
00479             QFileInfoList list = tmp.entryInfoList();
00480 
00481             if (tmp.exists(tmpDir)){
00482                 for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00483                     QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00484                     if (!tmp.remove(fileInfo.filePath()))
00485                         qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete files at: "<<fileInfo.filePath();
00486                 }
00487             } else {
00488                 if (!tmp.mkdir(tmpDir)){
00489                     qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't create temp directory at: "<<tmpDir;
00490                 }
00491             }
00492 
00493             args << "-o" << tmpDir;
00494             args << fileName;
00495 
00496             Process *exportProcess = new Process(args, CoreLib->getSetting("icotool", "wrestool").toString(), QDir::homePath(), tr("Exporting icon from binary file.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Exporting icon"));
00497 
00498             if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00499             //icotool -x -o ./regedit.png --width=32 --height=32 ./regedit.exe_14_100_0.ico
00500                 args.clear();
00501                 args << "-x";
00502 
00503                 // Updating file index
00504                 list = tmp.entryInfoList();
00505 
00506                 //Creating file list for converting
00507                 for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00508                     QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00509                     if (fileInfo.fileName().right(3)=="ico")
00510                         args << fileInfo.filePath();
00511                 }
00512 
00513                 args << "-o" << tr("%1/").arg(tmpDir);
00514 
00515                 //Converting ico files to png
00516 
00517                 //Look here, this function checks is some icons found, or not. 5 -- is default number of arguments,
00518                 //if more -- then we have some ico file to convert
00519                 if (args.size()>=4){
00520                     exportProcess = new Process(args, CoreLib->getSetting("icotool", "icotool").toString(), QDir::homePath(), tr("Convering icon from binary file.<br>This can take a while..."), tr("Converting icon"));
00521                     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00522                         IconsView *iconsView = new IconsView(tmpDir);
00523                         if (iconsView->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00524                             fileName=iconsView->selectedFile;
00525                             cmdGetIcon->setIcon (QIcon(fileName));
00526                         } else {
00527                             fileName.clear();
00528                         }
00529                     }
00530                 } else {
00531                     IconsView *iconsView = new IconsView(tmpDir);
00532                     if (iconsView->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00533                         fileName=iconsView->selectedFile;
00534                         cmdGetIcon->setIcon (QIcon(fileName));
00535                     } else {
00536                         fileName.clear();
00537                     }
00538                 }
00539             } else {
00540                 qDebug()<<"wrestool testing Rejected";
00541                 fileName.clear();
00542             }
00543 
00544             //Clearing temp files
00545             list = tmp.entryInfoList();
00546 
00547                 //Creating file list for converting
00548             for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00549                 QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00550                     if (!QFile::remove(fileInfo.filePath()))
00551                         qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete files at: "<<fileInfo.filePath();
00552             }
00553 
00554             if (!tmp.rmdir(tmpDir))
00555                 qDebug()<<"[EE] - Can't delete tmp dir: "<<tmpDir;
00556         }
00557 
00558         if (!fileName.isEmpty())
00559             iconPath=fileName;
00560     }
00561 
00562     return;
00563 }
00564 
00565 void IconSettings::cmdCancel_Click(){
00566     reject();
00567     return;
00568 }
00569 
00570 void IconSettings::cmdOk_Click(){
00571 
00572   if (txtProgramPath->text().isEmpty()){
00573       QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("No executiable program selected."));
00574       return;
00575   }
00576 
00577   if (txtName->text().isEmpty()){
00578       QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("No program name specified."));
00579       return;
00580   }
00581 
00582   if (icon_name!=txtName->text()){
00583       if (this->dir_name.isEmpty()){
00584           if (db_icon->isExistsByName(this->prefix_name, txtName->text())){
00585               QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, but icon named %1 already exists.").arg(txtName->text()));
00586               return;
00587           }
00588       } else {
00589           if (db_icon->isExistsByName(this->prefix_name, this->dir_name, txtName->text())){
00590               QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, but icon named %1 already exists.").arg(txtName->text()));
00591               return;
00592           }
00593       }
00594   }
00595 
00596   QSqlQuery query;
00597 
00598     QString override;
00599     for (int i=1; i<=twDlls->rowCount(); i++){
00600         override.append(tr("%1=").arg(twDlls->item(i-1, 0)->text()));
00601         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Native"))
00602                 override.append("n;");
00603         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Buildin"))
00604                     override.append("b;");
00605         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Native, Buildin"))
00606             override.append("n,b;");
00607         if (twDlls->item(i-1, 1)->text()==tr("Buildin, Native"))
00608             override.append("b,n;");
00609     }
00610 
00611     QString useconsole;
00612     if (cbUseConsole->checkState()==Qt::Checked){
00613         useconsole="1";
00614     } else {
00615         useconsole="0";
00616     }
00617 
00618     switch (this->icon_name.isEmpty()){
00619         case TRUE:
00620             db_icon->addIcon(txtCmdArgs->text(), txtProgramPath->text(), iconPath, txtDesc->text(), this->prefix_name, this->dir_name, txtName->text(), override, txtWinedebug->text(), useconsole, txtDisplay->text(), txtWorkDir->text(), txtDesktopSize->text(), spinNice->value());
00621         break;
00622         case FALSE:
00623             db_icon->updateIcon(txtCmdArgs->text(), txtProgramPath->text(), iconPath, txtDesc->text(), this->prefix_name, this->dir_name, txtName->text(), icon_name, override, txtWinedebug->text(), useconsole, txtDisplay->text(), txtWorkDir->text(), txtDesktopSize->text(), spinNice->value());
00624         break;
00625     }
00626 
00627     accept();
00628 
00629     return;
00630 }
